core_meaning: Sextile between Pluto and Pluto opens opportunity/skill. Pluto: . Pluto: . General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.
risk_notes: Complacency or overextension; assuming goodwill covers weak execution.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Pluto: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Pluto: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Pluto: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Pluto: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Pluto: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Pluto: act, iterate, measure; tone: opportunity/skill).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

hi.title: Pluto Sextile Pluto (हिन्दी)
